entries.decision: When implementation changes alter governance/process behavior, capture and promote a decision artifact before closeout.
entries.rationale: Prevents important operating decisions from being implicit in diffs and improves traceability across policy/runtime.
entries.title: Require decision reflection for operating-layer changes

entries.decision: Adopt a pinned dev dependency group in pyproject and require uv run --locked --group dev for quality-gate test execution.
entries.rationale: Ensures deterministic pytest/toolchain resolution across local and CI runs; avoids floating uv run --with pytest behavior.
entries.title: Use locked dev dependency group for pytest

entries.decision: Set governance completeness and enforceability as higher priority than coach/cortex decoupling; decoupling milestones depend on active governance-completeness checks.
entries.rationale: Recent misses showed that integrity checks pass even when decision capture completeness is incomplete; priority must shift to close this governance gap first.
entries.title: Prioritize governance completeness over decoupling

entries.decision: Remove in-repo coach runtime fallback and make cortex coach entrypoints delegate to installed standalone cortex-coach; finalize ownership-boundary governance docs.
entries.rationale: Phase 3 parity is complete and standalone coach is operational; retaining internal runtime risks boundary drift.
entries.title: Complete phase 4 external-only coach delegation

entries.decision: Adopt assistant-neutral reflect->abstract->generalize->encode->validate loop and encode outputs in operating artifacts.
entries.rationale: Ensure reflection governance portability across agents and keep durable repo-based memory.
entries.title: Require agent-agnostic reflection loop for governance learning

entries.decision: Remove stale local cortex-coach entrypoint metadata, install standalone coach in CI, and call delegator via python3 to avoid uv shadowing side effects.
entries.rationale: Prevents ModuleNotFoundError from broken local script shadowing and aligns execution with external-only coach ownership.
entries.title: Fix decoupled coach entrypoint shadowing in CI and scripts
